game.name: Custom Gun Creator
game.description:
Building different types of weapons is also a very interesting job. No, you are not going to build them in real, but all such things will take place in the virtual world today. Would you like to get you participated in weapon building? If yes, join Custom Gun Creator and gear up to create your very own weapons and test their range. The best part is that you would be also allowed to unlock new three pieces by completing your gun-creating mission.

It will be amazing to enter the shooting range to test out the capacity of your guns. There are two unique and engaging modes to play through in this HTML5 gun-building game. Build your amazing gun piece by piece or opt for following the blueprint! You will also have a choice to create your custom gun by entering the creative mode. Get a chance to unlock new parts to use after building a new gun in the creative mode!

Make sure to gun down at least 4 targets to finish each task in this one of the best shooting games for boys and girls. Common, friends! Use all three parts including grip, trigger and barrel to build your firearms! It is easy to learn how to create the instruments of destruction by completing all its levels. Roll your sleeves up and head on to complete all missions and become an expert in firearms! There are 10 latest and addictive levels to play through without download. Good luk to meet the present targets and continue to the next level!
game.metaTitle: Custom Gun Creator, Shooting Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Custom Gun Creator at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D AND ALL ARROWS TO MOVE  LEFT CLICK TO HIT
